languages.text: "Передайте, пускай остаются на корабле. Им дозволено питаться лишь погибшими, пленниками и друг другом".

traits.locale_text: "Передайте, пускай остаются на корабле. Им дозволено питаться лишь погибшими, пленниками и друг другом".

languages.text: "Tell them they may stay on the voidship. They are only allowed to feed on the dead, captives, and each other."
languages.original_text: "Передайте, пускай остаются на корабле. Им дозволено питаться лишь погибшими, пленниками и друг другом".

traits.locale_text: "Tell them to stay on the voidship. They are only allowed to feed on the dead, the captives, and each other."
"Tell them to stay on the voidship. They are only allowed to feed on the dead, the captives, and each other."
"Tell them they may stay on the voidship. They are only allowed to feed on the dead, captives, and each other."
"Tell them they may stay on the voidship. They are only allowed to feed on the dead, captives, and each other."
"Tell them they may stay on the voidship. They are only allowed to feed on the dead, captives, and each other."

languages.text: “告诉他们，他们可以留在船上，但他们只能吃死人、俘虏和他们自己人。”
languages.original_text: "Tell them they may stay on the voidship. They are only allowed to feed on the dead, captives, and each other."

traits.locale_text: “告诉他们，他们可以留在船上，但他们只能吃死人、俘虏和他们自己人。”

languages.text: «Dígales que pueden permanecer en la nave del vacío. Solo podrán alimentarse de los muertos, los prisioneros y entre ellos».
languages.original_text: "Tell them they may stay on the voidship. They are only allowed to feed on the dead, captives, and each other."

traits.locale_text: «Dígales que pueden permanecer en la nave del vacío. Solo podrán alimentarse de los muertos, los prisioneros y entre ellos».

languages.text: "Sag ihnen, dass sie auf dem Leerraumschiff bleiben dürfen. Sie dürfen sich nur von den Toten, den Gefangenen und von einander ernähren."
languages.original_text: "Tell them they may stay on the voidship. They are only allowed to feed on the dead, captives, and each other."

traits.locale_text: "Tell them they may stay on the voidship. They are only allowed to feed on the dead, captives, and each other."

languages.text: « Dites aux cannibales qu'ils peuvent rester à bord du vaisseau, à condition de se nourrir uniquement des morts, des prisonniers et de leurs propres congénères. »
languages.original_text: "Tell them they may stay on the voidship. They are only allowed to feed on the dead, captives, and each other."

traits.locale_text: « Dites aux cannibales qu'ils peuvent rester à bord du vaisseau, à condition de se nourrir uniquement des morts, des prisonniers et de leurs propres congénères. »

languages.text: 「ヴォイドシップに留まってもよいと伝えろ。死人と捕虜、そして仲間同士を喰べることしか許さない」
languages.original_text: "Tell them they may stay on the voidship. They are only allowed to feed on the dead, captives, and each other."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴォイドシップに留まってもよいと伝えろ。死人と捕虜、そして仲間同士を喰べることしか許さない」

languages.text: "Onlara uçsuz gemisinde kalabileceklerini söyleyin. Yalnızca ölülerden, tutsaklardan ve birbirlerinden beslenmelerine izin verilecek."
languages.original_text: "Tell them they may stay on the voidship. They are only allowed to feed on the dead, captives, and each other."
